name: Refrigerator LG GBF61BLHMN Black
origAbout: LG LINEARCooling™ refrigerators come to our rescue by keeping the fruits and vegetables fresh for up to 14 days. They come with Inverter Linear Compressor. The Inverter Linear Compressor operates within the temperature range of 0.5°C , providing even cooling that helps retain freshness for long. Not only this, Inverter Linear Compressor helps you save energy, reduces noise. LG Door Cooling+™ makes inside temperature more even and cools the refrigerator 35% faster than the conventional cooling system.

details.name: Annual Energy Consumption (kW/Year), kilowatt per hour per Year
